qas.question: When was importation of slaves banned in Saint Helena?
The emancipation of the slaves of Saint Helena did not take place until what year?
Who banned slavery in their colonies?
Over how many slaves ended up getting emancipated on Saint Helena?

context: Although the importation of slaves to St Helena had been banned in <a0_0>1792<a0_0/>, the phased emancipation of over <a3_0>800<a3_0/> resident slaves did not take place until <a1_0>1827<a1_0/>, which was still some six years before the <a2_0>British Parliament<a2_0/> passed legislation to ban slavery in the colonies.
